content.raw:
Bounding boxes are a good idea, but they are conservative. Consider the gas station model:
![gas_station.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/RgX9je/images/156689774-gas_station.png)

There are many parts of that model that can be travelled through. Of course, that's a very difficult example because it has the roof that can be driven under. Shooting a beam from the sky, which is what the CollisionMapCreatorPlugin does, would not tell you that you can drive underneath it.
content.html:
Bounding boxes are a good idea, but they are conservative. Consider the gas station model:

There are many parts of that model that can be travelled through. Of course, that's a very difficult example because it has the roof that can be driven under. Shooting a beam from the sky, which is what the CollisionMapCreatorPlugin does, would not tell you that you can drive underneath it.
